about.title: About HerHaven
about.subtitle: Empowering women victims through compassionate support
about.description: HerHaven is a multidisciplinary initiative bringing together mental health professionals, technologists, and advocates, dedicated to promoting psychological well-being among victims of gender-based violence through innovative digital tools and community-centered care.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: HerHaven envisions a Rwanda where every woman victim of gender-based violence has access to compassionate, holistic care that fosters healing, dignity, and hope.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To support women victims of gender-based violence in Rwanda by expanding access to mental health care, reducing stigma, and building safe, inclusive networks for recovery and empowerment, resulting in a 20% increase in survivors utilizing mental health support services by the end of 2028.

whyHerHaven.title: Why HerHaven?
whyHerHaven.description: In Rwanda, nearly half of women experience abuse or violence. HerHaven is a digital platform that provides safe, compassionate support, helping women access care, heal, and build fulfilling lives.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Confidentiality and data protection come first.

listen.title: Listen with Compassion
listen.description: We create a safe space where women victims can share their experiences, be heard without judgment, and have their voices truly valued.

build.title: Build Safe Spaces
build.description: We create a secure, confidential space where women can access support, resources, and healing without fear or judgment.

empower.title: Empower & Connect
empower.description: We link victims to professional care and supportive communities.
